line_1: I niver was hawf sae weel pleas'd i' my leyfe!
line_2: And Jaffer was him hed the beautiful weyfe;

line_1: And whea was mair happy thro' aw his lang leyfe?
line_2: But Willy he laugh'd, and he meade me his weyfe,

line_1: And treyfles mek the sum o' leyfe;
line_2: A wretched or a happy weyfe!
